spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout and room adjacency are well-preserved. However, the twin bedroom on the left was reduced to a single bed. Window placement in the living area has been modified from the plan.

structural_fidelity.notes: Excellent adherence to structural constraints. Model is floating on a dark background, no roof, all rooms visible, and completely free of text or measurement lines.

furniture_mapping.notes: Good block-style representation. Points deducted for missing one twin bed in the left bedroom and the repositioning of the kitchen counter/sink layout compared to the original plan.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Perfect execution of the low-poly style. Flat shading, soft ambient lighting, and a correct 45-degree isometric orthographic camera angle are all present.

detected_errors.description: Missing second bed in the left-hand bedroom as specified in the 2D floor plan.
Kitchen/Bathroom fixtures slightly rearranged and window placement in the bottom right differs from the source blueprint.
